meanings.definition: To utter a curse or swear
meanings.sent1: She becurses loudly when she stubs her toe.
meanings.sent2: He becurses whenever he is frustrated.
meanings.sent3: The pirate becurses the storm for ruining his treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The witch's becurses seemed to have a real effect on the town.
meanings.sent5: The old man's becurses were so powerful, they made the birds stop singing.

meanings.definition: To bring evil upon someone or something
meanings.sent1: The witch becurses her enemies with dark magic.
meanings.sent2: The villain becurses the hero to ensure his defeat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fairy accidentally becurses the entire village.
meanings.sent4: The haunted house is said to be becursed by a vengeful spirit.
meanings.sent5: The ancient curse becurses all who dare to enter the forbidden temple.
